mapper.select: SELECT customer_code, customer_name, customer_kana, customer_pass, customer_birth, customer_job, customer_mail, customer_tel, customer_post, customer_add FROM customer WHERE customer_code = #{customerCode}
mapper.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(nextval('CUSTOMER_CODE_SEQ'),'FM00000000') AS customerCode
INSERT INTO customer ( customer_code, customer_name, customer_kana, customer_pass, customer_birth, customer_job, customer_mail, customer_tel, customer_post, customer_add ) VALUES ( #{customerCode}, #{customerName}, #{customerKana}, #{customerPass}, #{customerBirth}, #{customerJob}, #{customerMail}, #{customerTel}, #{customerPost}, #{customerAdd} )
